strapiEvent.name: Vegetable Gardening Class
strapiEvent.location: Botanical Garden of the Ozarks - Fayetteville, AR
strapiEvent.description:
Want to start a vegetable garden but not sure where to start?

Join Berni Kurz, Director of Horticulture, for an informative class on how to create a new vegetable garden. This is a great class for beginners, as well as an opportunity to troubleshoot and get your questions answered.

FREE/members or $15/nonmembers
